Landing.HeroTextOne: No manual management of orders.NEW Integrated automations.
Landing.Ihre Anweisungen werden akkurat befolgt,: Your instructions are followed accurately, resulting in human errors being avoided.
Landing.Lassen Sie die Arbeit automatisch fürSie: Have the work done for you automatically, including menu updates and automated order placement
Landing.Vergessen Sie verspätete oder verpasste: Forget about late or missed orders - they are automatically created in your POS
Landing.Kümmern Sie sich um Leckeres Essen, den: Take care of delicious food, we'll take care of the rest

Landing.Deine eigene App und Webshop Individuell: Your own app and webshop Individual and independent
Landing.Fange ganz einfach an zu bauen Der Templ: Start building easily. Tape's template market and intuitive design enable you to map even complex requirements.
Landing.Hier sind alle deine Bestellungen in ein: Here you can find all your orders in a comprehensive overview. Easy driver tracking and efficiency evaluation
Landing.Alles im Überblick Genau das was du will: Everything at a glance. Exactly what you want.
Landing.Das System bündelt alle Bestellungen der: The system automatically bundles all orders from the branches and displays them in an overview, including daily sales, employee working hours and much more.
Landing.Schnellere Auftragsvergabe über die Fahr: Faster order placement via the driver app for nearby drivers. Delivery in under 30 minutes thanks to automatic route planning.EBIKE DELIVERY
Landing.TestimonialOne: PayPoint exceeded my expectations! The user interface is intuitive and easy to use. The integration with my store was seamless, and I particularly appreciate the extensive reporting features that help me keep track of my sales.
Landing.TestimonialTwo: PayPoint is a reliable POS system that has helped my small business increase sales. It offers basic features at a reasonable price and has proven to be a good investment.

Pricing.Kassensystem, Web und AppShop: Cash register system, Web, and AppShop

Pricing.Beispiel für 100% Bestellungen über den: Example for 100% orders via the own webshop
Pricing.Getorder: GetOrder integrates and centralizes all your online orders to your existing POS system, making online order management simple, friendly and reliable.

Aboutus.Wir packen Dinge an und präsentieren Lös: We tackle things and present solutions. We love innovations, believe in the impossible, and prioritize our community.
Aboutus.Unser Kassensystem, PayPoint, ist eine u: Our cash register system, PayPoint, is a comprehensive solution for your business, aiming to optimize the payment process and increase business efficiency. Its user-friendly interface allows for easy transaction processing, while providing powerful features for sales tracking and inventory management.
Aboutus.Diese Kombination aus Benutzerfreundlich: This combination of user-friendliness and functionality makes PayPoint an indispensable tool for business people looking to improve their operations. With PayPoint, you can say goodbye to complicated cash register processes and create a more efficient, productive business environment.
Aboutus.Entdecken Sie, wie PayPoint Ihr Unterneh: Discover how PayPoint can revolutionize your business and help you save time and use resources more effectively. From small businesses to large retailers, PayPoint offers a tailored solution for your specific needs, contributing to maximizing your business success.
Aboutus.Unser Ziel ist es, Ihr Geschäft mit PayP: Our goal is to support your business with PayPoint by providing a comprehensive cash register solution that is not only user-friendly but also offers powerful features to optimize your operational processes and increase your business success.
Aboutus.Ein Team von begeisterten Unternehmern u: A team of enthusiastic entrepreneurs and software freaks.
Aboutus.Unabhängig von anderen Unternehmen oder: Independent of other companies or technical specifications.
Aboutus.Wir suchen kluge Köpfe: We are looking for smart minds
Aboutus.Was wäre eine ständig wachsende Firma oh: What would a constantly growing company be without growth? If you are looking for a new challenge, we might be able to help you.
Aboutus.Jelena Fischer ist die visionäre Kopf de: Jelena Fischer is the visionary head of the company, advancing success with strategic skill and a focus on excellence. Her understanding of the market and promotion of an innovative work culture ensure the growth and prosperity of the company.
Aboutus.Abdullah ist das kreative Genie im Team,: Abdullah is the creative genius in the team, transforming Jelena's visions into innovative software solutions. His passion for code and constant curiosity drive him to continuously improve and expand PayPoint's products.
Aboutus.Isa ist der dynamische Motor im Vertrieb: Isa is the dynamic engine in PayPoint's sales team. With his unparalleled negotiation skills and ability to build strong customer relationships, he drives the growth of the company.
Aboutus.Gian ist der inspirierende Leiter des Ve: Gian is the inspiring leader of the sales team at PayPoint. With his strategic approach and commitment to customer satisfaction, he is a key driver for success in the sales area.
Aboutus.Jelena ist das organisatorische Rückgrat: Jelena is the organizational backbone of the company, ensuring smooth communication and workflows in the office. With her efficiency, organizational talent, and friendly nature, she supports the team and contributes to ensuring all workflows operate smoothly.
Aboutus.Toussef ist ein kreativer Softwareentwic: Toussef is a creative software developer who works with passion and expertise in developing innovative solutions. His technical skill and commitment to quality make him a valuable member of the team, continuously working to improve and optimize PayPoint's products.

As a gastronomer, you have to think about many things at the same time and, in addition to the quality of ongoing business, also have all background processes under control. PayPoint supports you with this, ensuring smooth processes in your restaurant, allowing you to focus on your daily business, among other things with
Common.Welche Vorteile bieten dir die Module un: What benefits do the modules of our restaurant software offer you?
Common.Die Module der Restaurant Management Sof: The modules of the Restaurant Management Software digitize and automate all processes of your gastronomy, from ordering to delivery to your customers. With our software, you can generate up to 200% more turnover and reduce your costs by up to 40%. Your delivery service is thanks to
Common.zuverlässig und koordiniert gemanagt Auc: reliably and coordinatedly managed. Organization is also crucial in the kitchen. Make it as easy as possible for your employees and guide them with our help through a successful shift. Our
Common.strukturiert Vorgänge klar und analytisc: structures processes clearly and analytically, so your employees know exactly what to do. Idle time and process congestion are avoided, operating costs reduced, the management of personnel and resources optimized
Common.Wie funktioniert gutes Restaurant Market: How does good restaurant marketing work?
Common.Gutes Restaurant Marketing heißt, versch: Good restaurant marketing means combining various online and offline marketing activities correctly, helping you as a gastronomer to build brand loyalty, increase turnover, and reach more customers. Especially the use of digital marketing measures is nowadays a crucial factor to distinguish your restaurant from others. In our free eBook
Common.findest du hilfreiche Tipps zur Vermarkt: you will find helpful tips for marketing your business.

Deliveries are automatically bundled into routes, and drivers are quickly reachable via tracking. Your advantage: Guaranteed delivery in under 30 minutes and better customer ratings!

Common.Lange Lieferzeiten und eine unübersichtl: Long delivery times and confusing management of order channels are now an end! With SIDES, orders are automatically combined in the gastro cash register system. Orders from the web shop and app, in-house, telephone and delivery portals are then forwarded directly to the kitchen manager. Deliveries are automatically bundled into routes and drivers can be reached more quickly via tracking. Your advantage: guaranteed delivery in under 30 minutes and better customer reviews!
Common.Kann das System Rabatte oder Sonderangeb: Can the system manage discounts or special offers?
Common.Ja, das System bietet die Möglichkeit, R: Yes, the system provides the capability to manage discounts or special offers. Through the user interface of the cash register software, you can set up various types of discounts, such as percentage discounts, quantity discounts, or fixed amounts. These discounts can then be applied during the checkout process, either automatically or manually by the cashier.
Common.Wie kann ich technische Probleme mit der: How can I solve technical issues with the software or hardware?
Common.Wir bieten einen umfassenden Kundenservi: We provide comprehensive customer service that allows you to connect directly with our support team. Through tools like TeamViewer, we can quickly and efficiently connect to your PC to diagnose and resolve technical issues. Our support team is available 24/7 to ensure you receive assistance anytime issues arise. You can simply contact us, and we will strive to resolve your concerns as quickly as possible to minimize downtime and ensure smooth operation of your cash register software.
Common.Bietet das System Funktionen zur Verwalt: Does the system offer features to manage reservations for tables or events?
Common.Das System bietet Funktionen zur Verwalt: Yes, the system offers features to manage reservations for tables or events. This allows you to efficiently handle the booking process and provide guests with a smooth experience.
Common.Gibt es eine Möglichkeit, Sonderwünsche: Is there a way to accommodate special requests or customizations for orders?
Common.Ja, das System bietet die Möglichkeit, S: Yes, the system provides the capability to consider special requests or customizations for orders. This allows customers to customize their orders individually and ensure their needs are met.

Common.Mithilfe der Schnittstelle kannst du Bes: With the interface, you can manage orders directly in the cash register and don't have to work with various tablets.
Common.Dank der direkten Anbindung an die gängi: Thanks to the direct connection to popular delivery portals such as Lieferando, Wolt, or Uber Eats, online orders are automatically integrated into the cash register. Additionally, all items created in our software can be automatically transferred to selected delivery portals.

Common.dank kontaktloser Tischbestellung mit QR: thanks to contactless table ordering with QR Code.

Common.In der digitalen Speisekarte kannst du A: In the digital menu, you can set item suggestions that are automatically offered to your guests when selecting certain dishes.

Common.Du kannst deinen Restaurant Webshop selb: You can manage your restaurant webshop yourself and easily adjust and change all data, such as items, categories, or images.
Common.Bewerbe Rabattaktionen ganz einfach im W: Promote discount campaigns easily in the webshop and ordering app, thus binding customers to your delivery service in the long term.
Common.Dein Restaurant Webshop bietet auf jedem: Your restaurant webshop offers a great ordering experience on every device and is always displayed in the correct format and high resolution.
Common.Zeige deinen Kund:innen im Webshop und d: Show your customers in the webshop and app the current delivery status of their order, thereby increasing customer satisfaction.

Common.Alle Bestellkanäle in einem Kassensystem: All ordering channels in one POS system

Common.Thekenverkauf, Inhouse, zum Abholen oder: Counter sales, in-house, for takeout, or for your delivery service - PayPoint is by your side.
Common.Unser mobiles POS System kann von unbegr: Our mobile POS system can be used by an unlimited number of employees and saves a lot of time in the stressful restaurant everyday life.
Common.Zahlen per QR-Code am Tisch direkt mit d: Paying by QR code at the table directly with the phone? Splitting or partial payments made easy - whether cashless or in cash, let your guests pay seamlessly with our integrated payment system.
Common.Mit dem innovativen Paypoint Webshop bes: With the innovative Paypoint webshop, your guests can order contactlessly at the table using a QR code without waiting.

Common.In den meisten Restaurants wird online E: In most restaurants, food is ordered and delivered online. This service is part of the gastronomy offer and provides you with the opportunity to increase the number of orders, thus boosting your revenue and attracting new customer groups.

This means that incoming orders no longer need to be manually typed into the cash register but are automatically transferred.
